core

Interface CORE

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Tournament

    public interface CORE
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface specifies the behaviour expected from CORE as required for 6COM1037 Cwk Assignment - Nov 2020

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int enterChampion(java.lang.String nme)
      Allows a champion to be entered for the player's team, if there is enough money in the Treasury for the entry fee.The champion's state is set to "active" 0 if champion is entered in the player's team, 1 if champion is not in reserve, 2 if not enough money in the treasury, -1 if there is no such champion
      int fightChallenge(int chalNo)
      Retrieves the challenge represented by the challenge number.Finds a champion from the team which can challenge the challenge.
      java.lang.String getAllChallenges()
      Provides a String representation of all challenges
      java.lang.String getChallenge(int num)
      Provides a String representation of an challenge given by the challenge number
      java.lang.String getChampionDetails(java.lang.String nme)
      Returns details of any champion with the given name
      int getMoney()
      returns the amount of money in the Treasury
      java.lang.String getReserve()
      Returns a String representation of all champions in reserve
      java.lang.String getTeam()
      Returns a String representation of the champions in the player's team or the message "No champions entered"
      boolean isChallenge(int num)
      returns true if the number represents a challenge
      boolean isDefeated()
      returns true if Treasury <=0 and the player's team has no champions which can be withdrawn.
      boolean isInPlayersTeam(java.lang.String nme)
      Returns true if the champion with the name is in the player's team, false otherwise.
      boolean isInReserve(java.lang.String nme)
      returns whether champion is in reserve
      CORE loadGame(java.lang.String fname)
      reads all information about the game from the specified file and returns a CORE reference to a Tournament object
      void readChallenges(java.lang.String filename)
      reads challenges from a comma-separated textfile and stores
      int retireChampion(java.lang.String nme)
      Removes a champion from the team to the reserves (if they are in the team) Pre-condition: isChampion() 0 - if champion is retired to reserves 1 - if champion not retired because dead 2 - if champion not retired because not in team -1 - if no such champion
      void saveGame(java.lang.String fname)
      Writes whole game to the specified file
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the state of the game, including the name of the player, state of the treasury, whether defeated or not, and the champions currently in the team,(or, "No champions" if team is empty)

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of the state of the game, including the name of the player, state of the treasury, whether defeated or not, and the champions currently in the team,(or, "No champions" if team is empty)

      • enterChampion

        int enterChampion(java.lang.String nme)
        Allows a champion to be entered for the player's team, if there is enough money in the Treasury for the entry fee.The champion's state is set to "active" 0 if champion is entered in the player's team, 1 if champion is not in reserve, 2 if not enough money in the treasury, -1 if there is no such champion
        Parameters:
        nme - represents the name of the champion
        Returns:
        as shown above

        Returns:

      • retireChampion

        int retireChampion(java.lang.String nme)
        Removes a champion from the team to the reserves (if they are in the team) Pre-condition: isChampion() 0 - if champion is retired to reserves 1 - if champion not retired because dead 2 - if champion not retired because not in team -1 - if no such champion
        Parameters:
        nme - is the name of the champion
        Returns:
        as shown above

      • fightChallenge

        int fightChallenge(int chalNo)
        Retrieves the challenge represented by the challenge number.Finds a champion from the team which can challenge the challenge. The results of fighting an challenge will be one of the following: 0 - challenge won, add reward to the treasury, 1 - challenge lost on battle skills - deduct reward from treasury and record champion as "dead" 2 - challenge lost as no suitable champion is available, deduct the reward from treasury 3 - If a challenge is lost and player completely defeated (no money and no champions to withdraw) -1 - no such challenge
        Parameters:
        chalNo - is the number of the challenge
        Returns:
        an int showing the result(as above) of fighting the challenge

      • saveGame

        void saveGame(java.lang.String fname)
        Writes whole game to the specified file
        Parameters:
        fname - name of file storing requests

      • loadGame

        CORE loadGame(java.lang.String fname)
        reads all information about the game from the specified file and returns a CORE reference to a Tournament object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the game (as a Tournament object)

        Parameters:
